name: Student Project SEM 4: FS Airlines
description: Project simulates an online ticket booking and check-in web app. Passengers can book and check in for family's or ones' individual purpose.
roles: Analysis and design the database structure
Build the homepage, check in, seatmap layouts, the form and process for booking ticket
Arrange tasks to team members, set time duration for each phrase of the project

techStack.backend: Java Spring Boot integrated with Azure B2C for Sign-up, sign-in tasks

name: Student Project SEM 3: RaCE Car Insurance
description: Project simultates to manages purchasing insurance, making claims, retrieving estimates and maintaining certificates
roles: Analysis and design the database structure
Get/Retrieve an estimate, Purchase certificate features
